Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Reroute at Laramie/Le Moyne
ShortDescription: 57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Division, Cicero, North Ave, and Laramie, due to street blockage near Laramie/Le Moyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Laramie, Division, Cicero, North Ave, and Laramie, due to street blockage near Laramie/Le Moyne.

Allow extra travel time.
